name: Virginia City Inn

reviews.text: The rooms at the Virginia City Motel are clean and newly remodeled & furnished. The grounds are kept neat. The owner is very accommodating. The regular rooms for 2 are spacious and have jacuzzi's/shower. There is one apartment available that has separate living room, 1 bath., full kitchen, and separate bedroom. Great views from the apartment of surrounding hills. Internet access is available in all rooms except the apartment - which is rented out in the off season. There is no phone in the apartment for this reason. Dogs are very welcome here. The owner's horse is behind the motel, and loves any proffered apples you may have. The location is just out of the main town - a nice walk for exercise. Not much need for cab service here, so if you over-imbibe and don't want to drive back to motel, the local sheriff offers free rides - back to the motel, of course. The only downside was that a 'no smoking' policy was not told to us on reserving our rooms - an oddity in the wild west of Nevada. Wish a choice was offered.
reviews.title: Great Hideout from the Camel Races

description: The Virginia City Inn is under new ownership and completely remodeled for the traveler seeking modern amenities but preferring the atmosphere of a bygone era. Our rooms include air conditioning, cable television and internet access. Different themes of the rooms and a museum/gift shop are sure to bring back memories of the past. Virginia City is rich in history and has many events for your fun and enjoyment.
